title: Laugh
summary: Makes Mycroft laugh like a maniac ![](./sshot.png)
short_description: Makes Mycroft laugh like a maniac ![](./sshot.png)
description: Laugh randomly or when requested, gender configurable on home.mycroft.ai
name: Evil Laugh Skill
